Worlds.Name: P․R․O․超常現象研究機構［FILE02˸縁断鋏］

Worlds.Name: THE SMILE ROOM
Worlds.Description: Six children were reported missing in Jesterfield in 2006․ To this day‚ local police have not been able to find any of them․ One of the children was your childhood friend Anna Woodsen․ Sixteen years later you get a call from an unknown number․ Its Anna‚ and she'd like you to meet her in the basement of the Starlight Plaza․ Without questioning the mysterious caller too much‚ you head out in the dark to find Anna․ But when you arrive to the basement you realize something is not quite right․․․ The Smile Room is a VRChat Horror Experience inspired by IT ＆ The Backrooms․ Playtime˸ 1-2 Hours

Worlds.Name: WEATHER CAPSULE
Worlds.Description: 東洋FMウェザーリポートは、公益財団法人日本気象観測情報センターが同FM局の副チャンネルを使って都内の天候状況を24時間リアルタイムでお送りしている情報番組です。スタジオは江東区東雲のオフィス屋上に位置し、各配信設備を個人向けに貸し出しているほか、天気予報や放置箱システムなどの最新設備も備えております。利用無料。雨天や夜間のご利用の際はお足元にご注意ください。Toyo FM Weather Report is a 24-hour real-time information program providing weather conditions in Tokyo․ Each distribution facility is available for rent to individuals and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities such as weather forecasts and the Just AFK system․ Use of the studio is free of charge․ Please watch your step when using the studio in the rain or at night․
